about.summary: nloptr is an R interface to NLopt. NLopt is a free/open-source library for nonlinear optimization, providing a common interface for a number of different free optimization routines available online as well as original implementations of various other algorithms. See http://ab-initio.mit.edu/wiki/index.php/NLopt_Introduction for more information on the available algorithms. During installation on Unix the NLopt code is downloaded and compiled from the NLopt website.

name: r-nloptr
raw_recipe:
{% set version = '1.0.4' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-nloptr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: nloptr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/nloptr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/nloptr/nloptr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0981a80c46c174a5458bdb8427b2db5428c3daca12ff2c30df7023f143fad7b3

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win32]

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - r-base
    - {{native}}nlopt
    - posix                # [win]
    - {{native}}toolchain  # [win]
    - gcc                  # [not win]

  run:
    - r-base
    - {{native}}nlopt

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('nloptr')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('nloptr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=nloptr
  license: LGPL-3
  summary: ' nloptr is an R interface to NLopt. NLopt is a free/open-source library for nonlinear
    optimization, providing a common interface for a number of different free optimization
    routines available online as well as original implementations of various other algorithms.
    See http://ab-initio.mit.edu/wiki/index.php/NLopt_Introduction for more information
    on the available algorithms. During installation on Unix the NLopt code is downloaded
    and compiled from the NLopt website.'

  license_family: LGPL

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening

about.summary: nloptr is an R interface to NLopt. See http://ab-initio.mit.edu/wiki/index.php/NLopt_Introduction for more information on the available algorithms. During installation on Unix the NLopt code is downloaded and compiled from the NLopt website.
